checklists.title: Textile/Garment Factory (Needle Policy & Cutting Room) Audit
checklists.description: Comprehensive audit checklist for assessing compliance with broken needle policy and operational efficiency/safety in the cutting room of a textile/garment manufacturing unit in India.

items.question: Is the factory's Broken Needle Policy clearly documented, communicated to all relevant personnel, and effectively implemented (e.g., 'Two-for-one' exchange system, designated collection points for broken needles)?
Record the last calibration date and next scheduled calibration date for the primary needle/metal detector in the garment finishing or dispatch area.

Assess the overall adherence to safety protocols and housekeeping standards in the cutting room, including blade storage, fabric waste disposal, and clear pathways. (Refer to BIS/OSHA guidelines for safety).
Identify any observed deficiencies in the maintenance and operational condition of cutting room machinery (e.g., cutting machines, spreading tables, DG Set for backup power, electrical systems).

Rate the effectiveness of employee training programs on broken needle policy, safe handling of sharps, and reporting procedures for all relevant staff, including 'Maid/Housekeeping' and 'Security Guard' personnel.

Verify the presence and accuracy of the 'Broken Needle Register' and 'Needle Issue/Return Chalan', ensuring proper entries for needle exchanges and secure final disposal records, adhering to IST Standard documentation practices.

checklists.title: Pharma Manufacturing (GMP & Clean Room Audit)
checklists.description: Comprehensive audit checklist for assessing Good Manufacturing Practices and Clean Room operational compliance in pharmaceutical manufacturing facilities in India.

items.question: Record current differential pressure across specified cleanroom zones (e.g., between Grade C and Grade D production areas).
Is personnel entry and exit from cleanroom areas consistently adhering to established gowning and degowning procedures (e.g., air showers, hand sanitization, proper attire)?
Assess the percentage compliance of HVAC system maintenance records and calibration certificates against the annual preventive maintenance schedule, including DG Set operational readiness.
Rate the overall cleanliness, sanitation, and pest control effectiveness within non-production areas, including staff canteen and Maid/Housekeeping staff practices.

Identify any non-conformities related to storage conditions (temperature, humidity), segregation, or labeling of raw materials and finished products (e.g., missing/incorrect Chalan documentation for incoming goods).

Confirm prominent display of all mandatory regulatory licenses (e.g., Drug License, FSSAI License for canteen) and verify adherence to Indian Standard Time (IST) in operational logs and synchronized clocks across the facility.

checklists.title: Automotive Assembly Line (5S & Safety)
checklists.description: Comprehensive audit checklist for 5S implementation and safety compliance within an automotive assembly line, adhering to Indian industrial standards.

items.question: Is the sorting (Seiri) process effectively implemented, ensuring all unnecessary items, obsolete tools, and excess inventory are removed from the assembly line workstations and storage areas?

Evaluate the 'Set in Order' (Seiton) implementation, including clear demarcation of walkways, tool shadow boards, and accessibility of safety equipment as per defined Indian industrial safety standards.
Verify the operational status, accessibility, and validity of maintenance 'Chalan' (record/tag) for all fire extinguishers, hydrants, and emergency exits on the assembly line.
Identify any deficiencies in machine guarding, interlock systems, emergency stop functionality, and associated safety signage for critical equipment like robotic cells, presses, and conveyors.
Record critical parameters and check safety compliance for essential utilities: DG Set operational status, last service date, and LPG Bank pressure readings, along with valid statutory permits.
items.placeholder: Enter status, dates, readings, and permit details

items.question: Assess the overall effectiveness of 'Shine' (Seiso) and 'Sustain' (Shitsuke) through housekeeping standards, waste segregation, and ensure PPE availability for all personnel, including contractual 'Maid/Housekeeping' staff. Confirm the display of the FSSAI License in the canteen area (if applicable).

checklists.title: Chemical Plant (Hazmat Storage & Spill Kits)
checklists.description: Comprehensive audit checklist for evaluating hazardous material storage protocols and the readiness of spill response kits in an Indian chemical manufacturing facility, ensuring compliance with local regulations and best practices.

items.question: Are all hazardous materials stored in designated, properly labelled areas with secondary containment as per Indian regulatory standards (e.g., Factories Act, Chemical Accidents Rules)?
Record the latest calibration date for any critical temperature/pressure gauges in hazmat storage areas to ensure IST Standard compliance.
Assess the overall readiness and accessibility of spill kits (e.g., contents, placement, ease of deployment) at critical hazmat storage and handling points.
Identify and mark all observed deficiencies related to hazmat storage infrastructure or spill kit maintenance.
options: Unauthorized access to storage area (e.g., by contract Maid/Housekeeping staff)
Lack of clear access path for spill kits

items.question: Rate the effectiveness of emergency response training provided to plant personnel, including Security Guards, on hazmat spill handling procedures.
Verify the presence and validity of the latest 'Chalan' (manifest/receipt) for hazardous waste disposal generated from hazmat operations.

checklists.title: Food Processing Plant (FSSAI Schedule 4)
checklists.description: Comprehensive audit checklist for ensuring compliance with FSSAI Schedule 4 (General Requirements on Hygienic and Sanitary Practices) for food processing establishments in India.

items.question: Are the premises, including production areas, storage, and utilities, maintained in a hygienic condition, free from pests, and is the FSSAI License prominently displayed?
Record the current operational temperature of the main cold storage unit for perishable raw materials/finished goods (adhering to IST Standard).
Rate the overall awareness and adherence of all personnel (including Maid/Housekeeping, Security Guard) to FSSAI Schedule 4 hygiene practices and Good Manufacturing Practices (GMPs).
Assess the operational readiness and maintenance percentage of critical utilities (e.g., DG Set, Water Treatment Plant, LPG Bank) based on documented schedules and actual performance.
Identify any deficiencies in mandatory documentation and record-keeping (e.g., Challans for raw material, pest control logs, cleaning schedules, employee medical fitness certificates).
Provide details of the last potable water quality test (physical, chemical, microbiological) including the date of testing and overall compliance status.
items.placeholder: e.g., Date: 15-03-2024, Status: Compliant (as per IS 10500)

checklists.title: Steel/Heavy Engineering (Crane & Hoist Safety)
checklists.description: Comprehensive audit checklist for ensuring safety protocols and operational integrity of cranes and hoists in steel and heavy engineering facilities as per Indian statutory and best practice standards.

items.question: Is the crane's last statutory load test certificate current and valid as per Factories Act, 1948 and State Rules?
Assess the visual condition of all wire ropes for wear, corrosion, broken strands, and deformation as per BIS IS 2266 guidelines.
Evaluate the responsiveness and holding capacity of the hoist primary and secondary braking systems during operational checks.
Verify the presence and validity of current 'Competent Person' certification/operator licenses for all crane/hoist operators.
items.placeholder: e.g., License No. A12345, Issued: DD-MM-YYYY

items.question: Inspect the functionality and accessibility of all emergency stop buttons/switches on the crane and hoist systems. Note any defects.
Assess the percentage compliance rate with the mandated daily pre-operational check sheet completion and associated defect rectification process.

checklists.title: E-commerce Warehouse (Picking Accuracy & Racking) - Audit Checklist
checklists.description: Comprehensive audit checklist for evaluating picking accuracy, racking integrity, and associated operational processes within an Indian E-commerce warehouse environment.

items.question: Assess the overall picking accuracy rate (items picked correctly vs. total items picked) based on sample verification during the audit period.
Evaluate the structural integrity and stability of the racking system, including visible damage, missing components, and compliance with load bearing displays as per IS (Indian Standard) codes.
Record the operational status and last power-backup system (e.g., DG Set, UPS) check date for critical Warehouse Management System (WMS) servers and picking scanner charging stations.
items.placeholder: e.g., DG Set last checked 25/10/2023, Scanner chargers operational

items.question: Rate the adherence of picking staff to defined Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs), including sequence, scanning protocols, and product identification, observed during the audit.
Identify the primary root causes contributing to picking discrepancies or 'chalan' mismatches observed in outbound shipments.

Evaluate the adequacy of aisle widths and clear pathways for Material Handling Equipment (MHE) to ensure efficient and safe picking operations, considering Indian safety guidelines and IST Standard operational flow.

checklists.title: Cold Chain/Cold Storage (Temperature & Compressors)
checklists.description: Comprehensive audit checklist for evaluating the operational efficiency, compliance, and maintenance of cold chain and cold storage infrastructure, focusing on temperature management and compressor health.

items.question: Is the primary temperature monitoring system (e.g., SCADA, Data Logger) for all critical cold storage units functional and calibrated as per IST standards?
Record current internal temperature (in °C) for each critical cold storage zone. Specify zone name.
Assess the overall operational health and maintenance status of all primary compressors within the facility.
Evaluate the readiness of the DG Set (Diesel Generator) to provide immediate and sustained backup power for critical cold chain equipment in case of a main grid failure.
Identify any observed defects or operational issues with the compressor units (e.g., unusual noise, oil leaks, pressure drops, condenser blockage).
Is the FSSAI License prominently displayed, and are all relevant temperature logs, compressor maintenance records, and calibration certificates (Chalan) readily available for audit?

checklists.title: Fleet Management (Truck Tyre & Driver Chalan Check)
checklists.description: Comprehensive audit checklist for ensuring compliance and operational efficiency related to truck tyre management and driver chalan verification within the Indian logistics context.

items.question: Record average tread depth (in mm) for all main axle tyres, indicating any below statutory minimums (e.g., 1.6mm for commercial vehicles).
Identify and report any critical tyre damages such as deep cuts, sidewall bulges, ply separation, or uneven wear patterns across the fleet.
Verify the accuracy and completeness of the driver's current trip Chalan (consignment note, trip sheet, etc.) including load details, origin/destination, and authorized signatures.
Confirm the validity and presence of the driver's Driving License (DL) with relevant commercial vehicle endorsements and a current medical fitness certificate.
Assess the overall operational integrity and maintenance status of the fleet's tyres, considering inflation pressure, rotation records, and general upkeep.
Evaluate the adherence percentage to the scheduled tyre rotation, alignment, and balancing protocols as per fleet maintenance policy.

checklists.title: Last Mile Delivery Hub (Bike Condition & Bag Hygiene)
checklists.description: Comprehensive audit checklist to assess the operational readiness, safety compliance, and hygiene standards of two-wheeler fleets and associated delivery equipment at last-mile hubs.

items.question: Visual inspection of all active delivery bikes for general wear and tear, including tire pressure, brake functionality, and light operation.
Verification of valid statutory documents for all allocated bikes (Pollution Under Control (PUC) certificate, Registration Certificate (RC), Insurance, and Rider's Driving License (DL)).
Assessment of adherence to the prescribed daily cleaning protocol for delivery bags, covering both internal and external surfaces.
Detailed inspection of delivery bags for the presence of residual food particles, persistent stains, or discernible malodour, particularly in insulated compartments.
Recording of any observed critical defects on delivery bikes that could lead to a 'Chalan' or compromise safety (e.g., non-functional horn, damaged mirrors, faulty speedometer, excessive smoke).

Functional verification of essential hub equipment supporting bike maintenance and bag hygiene (e.g., air compressor pressure reading, water flow rate at washing station, DG Set operational status if present).
items.placeholder: Enter readings or status (e.g., Air: 80 PSI, Water: Good, DG: OK)

checklists.title: Godown/Depot Pre-Monsoon Leakage Check
checklists.description: Comprehensive audit checklist for assessing and mitigating potential water ingress and leakage risks in godown/depot facilities across India prior to the monsoon season.

items.question: General condition of the godown roof and ceiling, including any existing repair patches, for cracks, gaps, or structural weaknesses that may compromise weatherproofing.

Are all internal and external drainage systems (gutters, downspouts, storm drains, and sumps) clear of debris, free-flowing, and fully functional? (Check for blockages, damages, or inadequate capacity).

Assessment of external and internal wall integrity, particularly for dampness, efflorescence, visible cracks, or peeling paint indicative of potential seepage points from the ground or vertical surfaces.
Are all electrical wiring conduits, switchboards, outdoor junction boxes, and the DG Set canopy adequately sealed and protected against water ingress to prevent short circuits or equipment damage?
Condition of external periphery, including boundary walls, compound wall plaster, plinth protection, and surrounding ground levels, to prevent water accumulation or ingress from ground level.
Number of identified leakage points or water entry vulnerable areas in loading/unloading bays, dock leveler seals, and main entry/exit doors.

checklists.title: High-Rise Construction Site (Fall Protection & Netting)
checklists.description: Comprehensive audit checklist for assessing fall protection measures and safety netting compliance at high-rise construction projects as per Indian safety standards and best practices.

items.question: Are all fall protection systems (guardrails, lifelines, safety nets) installed, maintained, and inspected as per IS 10535 (Safety Belts and Lanyards) and relevant OHS regulations?
What is the estimated percentage of safety netting coverage for open edges, shafts, and potential fall zones across active work levels?
Record the latest inspection date and certified load capacity (in kN) for primary lifeline anchor points and safety net support structures.
Rate the effectiveness of worker training programs on fall prevention protocols and the consistent usage of Personal Protective Equipment (PPE) like full-body harnesses.
Identify observed defects or non-compliances in fall protection equipment or systems (select all that apply).
options: Corroded or improperly installed anchor points
Improper harness fit or damaged harness components
Missing/Expired PPE inspection records or Chalan

items.question: Assess the adequacy of the documented frequency for safety net tensioning, re-tensioning, and debris removal checks (1 = Highly Inadequate, 5 = Highly Adequate).

checklists.title: Excavation & Piling Work (Soil Stability)
checklists.description: Comprehensive audit checklist for evaluating soil stability measures during excavation and piling operations, ensuring adherence to design specifications and safety protocols.

items.question: Availability and adherence to Geotechnical Investigation Report (SIR) recommendations and drawings?
Effectiveness of the dewatering system in maintaining the desired groundwater table below excavation level?
Identify any observed defects or non-conformities in excavation slope stability or shoring/strutting systems.
options: Lack of regular inspection records (e.g., daily checklists)

items.question: Record the maximum daily excavation depth achieved and observed ground movement (if any) as per site supervisor's Chalan and logs.
Assess the competency of site supervision and engineering personnel in managing soil stability risks and implementing control measures.
Verification of Pile Load Test Reports against design parameters and Indian Standard (IS) codes (e.g., IS 2911 series) compliance?

checklists.title: Residential Society/RWA (Security Gate & Lift Audit)

items.question: Verify the operational status of the visitor management system (e.g., e-gate pass, manual register) and boom barrier synchronisation at all entry/exit points.

Rate the overall preparedness and functional status of fire safety equipment (e.g., extinguishers with valid chalan, hose reels, fire alarms) and clarity of emergency evacuation plans.
Provide details of any non-functional CCTV cameras, including location and estimated date of last operation, and verify the continuous recording backup duration in days.

checklists.title: Labour Camp Hygiene (Water & Sanitation)

items.question: Is the primary water source (e.g., municipal supply, borewell with valid Chalan) approved and regularly tested for potability as per IST standards, with records available for inspection?
Record the date of the last water quality test report (e.g., pH, TDS, residual chlorine) and the observed residual chlorine level (in ppm) at key distribution points within the camp.

items.question: Rate the perceived effectiveness of existing pest and vector control measures (e.g., mosquitoes, rodents, flies) in ensuring a hygienic and disease-free living environment for the residents.

Evaluate the functionality and maintenance status of backup water supply systems (e.g., elevated tanks, standby pumps) and emergency power for essential services (e.g., DG Set for water distribution).

checklists.title: Electrical Safety (Temporary DB & Cabling)

items.question: Condition of temporary Distribution Board (DB) enclosures, including ingress protection (IP) rating and physical integrity?

Identify common defects observed in temporary cabling and connections.
Overall adherence to site-specific electrical safety procedures and work permits for temporary electrical installations, including periodic checks and maintenance logs.

Percentage of Security Guard and Maid/Housekeeping staff who have received and can demonstrate understanding of mandated emergency evacuation and safety protocols.

Rate the overall effectiveness of staff training and awareness programs related to expiry date checking, FIFO principles, and product rotation best practices.
